author: Phil Vickery
method: Roll up each piece of mackerel and secure with a cocktail stick. Heat the olive oil in a small frying pan over a medium heat. Add the mackerel and fry for two minutes on each side, then remove from the pan and put onto a slice of griddled ciabatta. To make the rocket pesto, place all the ingredients into a food processor and blend until smooth. To serve, pour the rocket pesto over the mackerel rolls.
ingredients: 1 mackerel fillet, cut in half,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 slice ciabatta, griddled,  1 bunch rocket,  2 tsp sesame seeds,  1 tbsp olive oil,  2 tsp red wine vinegar,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
